segments.text: Why do you want to work in our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there are 2 reasons . First of all , I'm itching to work in a foreign enterprise . Secondly , your branch is a new establishment in Beijing . I think I'll be assigned more workload and responsibilities here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me something about the balance sheet now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . The balance sheet contains 3 major sections , that is , assets , liabilities and owner's equity .
segments.speaker: S2
